00016 #include "BGBuffer.h"
00017 #include "TTEApplicationBase.h"
00018 
00019 namespace TTEthernetModel {
00020 
00021 Define_Module(BGBuffer);
00022 
00023 void BGBuffer::initialize()
00024 {
00025     //Update displaystring
00026     setIsEmpty(true);
00027 }
00028 
00029 void BGBuffer::handleMessage(cMessage *msg)
00030 {
00031     Buffer::handleMessage(msg);
00032 
00033     if (msg->arrivedOn("in"))
00034     {
00035         cMessage *outgoingMessage = dequeue();
00036 
00037         if(outgoingMessage){
00038             //Send Message
00039             for (std::list<cGate*>::iterator gate = destinationGates.begin(); gate != destinationGates.end(); ++gate)
00040             {
00041                 sendDirect(outgoingMessage->dup(), *gate);
00042             }
00043             if(gate("out")->isConnected()){
00044                 send(outgoingMessage->dup(),"out");
00045             }
00046             //TODO: Message was not really transmitted! Maybe we find a better moment to execute the callback
00047             for(std::map<TTEApplicationBase*,Callback*>::const_iterator iter = transmitCallbacks.begin();
00048                     iter != transmitCallbacks.end(); ++iter){
00049                 iter->first->executeCallback(iter->second);
00050             }
00051             recordPacketSent();
00052             delete msg;
00053         }
00054     }
00055 }
00056 
00057 } //namespace
